directions: With a fork, flake tuna into a bowl. Stir in corn, onion, cilantro, salsa, and lime juice. Season with a few dashes of hot sauce, and salt and pepper to taste. Stir to combine, then spoon onto tostada shells. Top each tostada with a dollop of sour cream and a bit more hot sauce.
ingredients: 3 (5 ounce) cans solid white tuna packed in water, drained
title: Tuna Lime Tostadas
